snippet: In responding to Yahoo's original intellectual property lawsuit, Facebook argued that the Web pioneer has violated patents that cover some 80 percent of its revenues last year, amounting to more than $4 billion.
abstract: In responding to Yahoo's original intellectual property lawsuit, Facebook argued that the Web pioneer has violated patents that cover some 80 percent of its revenues last year, amounting to more than $4 billion.

headline.main: DealBook: Facebook Accuses Yahoo of Infringing on Patents
